description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fight the gangs of Paris in this action packed Beat'Em Up. Up to 4 players can join in, with a choice of 3 cooperative game modes, or fight against each other in versus mode! Many unlockables, crazy combos and devastative furies await you in this deep fighting game. www.StreetsOfFury.com
